chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
si
genial! me encuentro en el punto de partida del mapa, veo que a mi izquierda hay una ramita que conduce a una isla pequeña con un tigre
¿hacia dónde voy desde aquí?
esa es la ruta correcta
¡perfecto! ahora, estoy en la isla con el tigre
¿dónde voy después, amigo?
pasa la roca
entendido, camino hacia las rocas
ahora, estoy en una isla con un parrot. ¿cuál es el siguiente paso, amigo?
tienes que ir al rededor del parrot. El camino esta localizado entre el parrot y el elefante
ok, voy alrededor del parrot rumbo al elefante
ahora estoy en una isla grande con un elefante. ¿siguo recto?
no tamo el camino que rodea el bosque y cruza a la isla con la rana
perfecto, rodeo el bosque y cruzo a la isla de la rana
si
ok! ahora estoy en la isla con la rana, veo un cocodrilo a la izquierda debería ir a ese lado?
si, toma el camino de cocdrilo
genial, camino hacia el lado del cocodrilo ahora estoy de vuelta en la isla grande con el mismo elefante
si, ahora cruza la isla a donde esta la jirafa
¡vale! cruzo la isla hacia la jirafa estoy ahora con la jirafa al oeste del elefante
si
genial! ¿qué sigue después de la jirafa?
pues de alli, sigue la isla de laserpiente
vale, camino hacia la isla de la serpiente, al sureste de la jirafa, ¿verdad?
si
así se hace! veo la serpiente
ahora veo un tesoro al este. ¿es esa la próxima parada?
si
¡perfecto! dos pasos al este y
¡he encontrado el tesoro! *finished* gracias por las indicaciones, fue divertido. ¿jugamos de nuevo?

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hola amigo
si
cool, let's get started! first, from the white dog, take a few steps to the left, move right below the wooden bench, and then cross the trail toward the florist stand
got it so far?
awesome! now, tu necesitas dar una vuelta completa
so, make a 180-degrees turn, cross the trail again and go back to where our white fur friend is. feeling adventurous yet?
I am confused amigo
no problem buddy! so, from the florist stand, all you need to do is turn around completely, head back over the trail, and towards the white dog
it's like playing tag with the pup, you're almost back at him!
I am back at the bench
great! now, let's take our adventure southwards. veer to the south from the bench, cross over the branch and keep going south(old down)
another furry friend awaits us there. let's go!
okay
I am here
awesome! now, let's spice things up. step over the mat, make sure you touch the bowl of berries
done that? nice, now keep heading west. almost there!
fantastic, buddy! you're doing great
now cross the river by taking that branch up north. you got this!
thank you!
para donde
you're welcome! now, see that green bush after you cross the river? don't walk on it
instead, circle it from the right side. keep going till you reach the florist stand
turn left at the florist stand
you're heading under the stand until you reach a big bridge. notice the people riding bicycles? walk past them, heading west
done
perfecto, friend! now just past that bridge you'll see two old folks sitting on a bench, reading newspapers
soak in the peaceful atmosphere, and head a few steps south
okay I am here
great! now there's a green bush by the end of a wooden branch isn't there? head towards that without touching the branch!
okay
yay! now, walk east, but stay between the branch and the bush, okay? it's our last stretch before the finish line
oka
fantastic! now, do you see a brown young deer a few steps ahead? that's your final stop! congratulations, mi amigo! you've done an amazing job navigating the map!
yes
fantastic! you've done an amazing job
you've made it to the end. we should play again sometime, that was fun!

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Yes! You are at the tent correct?
yes, i'm standing by the tent, on the top of the map
what's the first step, bud?
take two steps east as if you were walking away from the dog
alright, took a couple steps east away from the pupper
i'm now near a red mushroom. what's next, friend?
sorry I meant west
no worries, pal. i'm now back near the dog and the fire
and then a couple steps west. which direction now?
a few more steps west
okay, a few steps west and i'm now standing near the blue car
what's the next move, amigo?
Oops try going back to the starting point
okay, back at the tent
what's our new route, pal?
go south and around the pup
okay, taken a stroll around the dog, now by the blue car again
okay so what you want to do is go back to the tent, you need to go a little more south than the pup. But then you need to go a bit north of the fire, then you should be at the car
gotcha, back at the tent, strolling south, a touch north of the fire, and voila - the blue car again! where to next?
follow the dirt road and then cross the grassy patch between the telescope and the bush to the left of the telescope
alright, followed the dirt road, crossed the grassy patch between the telescope and the bush
now i'm standing right next to some rocks. am i going in the right direction?
yes!
awesome! i moved past the rocks and i see a wooden house ahead
is that our final destination?
no head to the wooden cabin
oh, sorry about the confusion
i'm now standing at the wooden cabin. *finished*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
yes
great! let's start under the first palm tree on your left, move towards the second one
after you pass it, take a sharp left before the third palm tree now and walk south
okay
good job! now, do you see that cute little brown puppy? move towards its left a bit
slight left and then right. keep heading south
towards the large boulders
yes, you got it! you're aiming between that big rock on your left and the small one on your right
go on!
okay after that go where?
awesome, now you should be near the water
see that big red crab? fist bump it and turn right towards the west. stick along the big rock!
okay I am near the very edge of the page is that correct?
yes, you're doing great! after a bit, you'll see a medium rock, keep moving till you spot a shark in the water
just then, turn sharply to the right
okay
fantastic! now head straight back to land, pass between the medium rock and that colorful ball
keep moving north
okay
sweet! now veer a tad left and keep walking but towards the northwest this time
pass between that red cool tent on the left and the bigger speaker on the right
okay!
woo-hoo! now just stroll in a nice arc all around that tent, and head south
okay!
you're nearly there! right before you hit the water, turn right and go under that funky red kayak
I am just under the kayak
perfect
now make a sharp right turn and move along the kayak heading north
should I be to the right or to the left of the kayak
stick to the right side of the kayak
keep going until you reach a small green bush. guess what? you made it!

general_survey.answer: I think they are very social and enjoy talking in ways that help articulate what it is they want people to understand
